abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews A&E reality series Monster In-Laws.
snippet: “Monster In-Laws,” a new A&E reality show, takes families with in-law issues and pairs them with a “relationship expert” who is supposed to help them find a more workable way of interacting.
lead_paragraph: “Monster In-Laws,” a new A&E reality show, takes families with in-law issues and pairs them with a “relationship expert” who is supposed to help them find a more workable way of interacting.

headline.main: Family Dysfunctions and the Duct Tape Détente
headline.print_headline: Family Dysfunctions and the Duct Tape Détente
headline.seo: ‘Monster In-Laws,’ Reality Show on A&E - Review
